titleStmt.title: At the Blew-Ball in Sir William Pritchards [sic] rents in Haydon-Yard in the Little-Minories near the Tower, London, liveth Mr. Elmy, operator, occulist, and practitioner of that noble art of healing: who
titleStmt.author: Elmy, Mr.
